bioconda.name: glimmer
bioconda.summary: Glimmer is a system for finding genes in microbial DNA

biocontainers.name: glimmer
biocontainers.summary: Glimmer is a system for finding genes in microbial dna

biotools.summary: System for finding genes in microbial DNA, especially the genomes of bacteria, archaea, and viruses. It uses interpolated Markov models (IMMs) to identify the coding regions and distinguish them from noncoding DNA.

bioschemas.name: Glimmer
bioschemas.summary: System for finding genes in microbial DNA, especially the genomes of bacteria, archaea, and viruses. It uses interpolated Markov models (IMMs) to identify the coding regions and distinguish them from noncoding DNA.
